post_title: FS Lajoie w/ Bat and Speaker Saturday Evening Post Stamps
post_content:
Looking to sell a Lajoie w/ bat and Speaker with Saturday Evening Post (John Anderson Agent) back stamps. Asking $2,450 for the pair. Please feel free to contact me with questions or for additional photos.

Thanks,
Eric

I used to own a Cobb, Bat on, with the same stamp on back.

GLWS
